channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description: if i use the addSkillexp with 1400000000 exp it will level me up to 99? correct? but my stat will be 1/99 and will slowly rise. Is there a command that will recharge my skill fast and become 99/99

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:4, topic:330668”]Alright, I’ll help you get it to work then.

Post your command for giving yourself xp, or is it not a command?[/quote]
Well what it is, is you talk to someone in staffisland and if your a mod he gives you exp. Here is the code.

case 128: if (playerRights >= 1) { talk("Remember, your stats are used for moderation purposes only!", 500); addSkillXP(1400000000, 0); addSkillXP(1400000000, 1); addSkillXP(1400000000, 2); addSkillXP(1400000000, 3);

Read full topic

item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

runefreak10:

Try adding refreshSkills(); into the command. I’m not sure if that will do it. I know how but I’m too lazy to actually look right now.

i thought it was that myself but it dint work
